Case# MPMovieSourceType.file

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case file
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieSourceType/file#Discussion)

The movie is a local file or is a file that can be downloaded from the network.
